content:
While I acknowledge the necessity for community building around teaching FHIR, it's apparent that the name of this stream leads to some confusion, as this is not inteded as a FHIR-Academy but rather as a "FHIR in Academia" discussion.

Questions:
1. What do we rename this stream to to prevent any further confusion
2. How do we rename the stream?
I can rename the stream once you figure out what you want it to be called
